mapper.select: select address1, gh.guesthouse_id ghId, name gname, room_count roomCount, room_pay roomPay, introduce, lat, lng, picture pictureGh,a.good from guesthouse gh left outer join (select guesthouse_id,count(*) good from house_check hc where good_or_bad = '1' group by guesthouse_id) a on a.guesthouse_id=gh.guesthouse_id where address1 like '%' || #{address1} || '%'

select rp.picture pictureRoom, gh.guesthouse_id ghId from guesthouse gh, room r, room_picture rp where address1 like '%' || #{address1} || '%' and gh.guesthouse_id = r.guesthouse_id and r.room_id = rp.room_id
